short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect your Web3 wallet to earn points for sharing your unused computing power.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the AI Revolution and Get Rewarded!

AI is reshaping the world, and now you can earn rewards by contributing to its growth!

LIFT DataBridge is a fast, simple, and free way to participate in the next generation of AI. By installing the DataBridge extension, you contribute a small amount of unused computing power to help train AI modelsâ€”all while earning airdrop points!

Once installed, DataBridge runs quietly in the background of your browser, utilizing minimal idle computing power. You'll never notice any impact on your device's performance, even during demanding tasks. By default, LIFT DataBridge cannot see any of your personal information or activity.

Double Your Rewards with Stream to Earn
Opt into our Stream to Earn feature and double your airdrop point earnings! Stream to Earn helps LIFT AI better understand live content like Twitch and YouTube live streams by sharing periodic screenshots in a privacy-preserving way. Rest assured, no personally identifiable information is ever shared with LIFT.

Privacy and Security You Can Trust
Your privacy is our top priority. The DataBridge extension does not access your screen by default and never collects personal data. If you enable Stream to Earn, any screen captures are processed locally on your device, and sensitive information is automatically removed before anything is sent to LIFT.

Key Features:

1. Earn as You Contribute: Start accumulating airdrop points simply by installing and running LIFT DataBridge.

2. Seamless Operation: The extension works automatically in the background without impacting your device's performance.

3. Privacy First: LIFT DataBridge respects your privacy, never accessing personal data or interfering with your activities.

4. Optional Increased Rewards: Opt into Stream to Earn to double your rewards while maintaining strict privacy protections.

5. Support AI Advancement: Play a direct role in training next-generation AI models without needing any technical expertise.

AI is shaping the future, and its benefits should be shared by all. Install LIFT's DataBridge today and turn your idle computing power into valuable rewards.
